title: S4 Ep48: Coming out in America
itunes:title: Coming out in America
description: Two new papers pinpoint the election of 1992 as a turning point in the attitudes of Americans to same-sex relationships, and ask, what has caused this change? Raquel Fernandez and Sahar Parsa of NYU tell Tim Phillips about the complex relationship between political and social attitudes.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
